Package index

Geom Functions

Functions for plotting geom areas

geom_cbb_teams()
Visualize College Basketball Team Logos in ggplot2
geom_cbb_conferences()
Visualize College Basketball Conference Logos in ggplot2
geom_cbb_headshots()
Visualize College Basketball Player Headshots in ggplot2
geom_median_lines() geom_mean_lines()
ggplot2 Layer for Horizontal and Vertical Reference Lines

Elements

Functions plotting in element_ areas

element_cbb_teams() element_cbb_headshots() element_cbb_conferences() element_grob(<element_cbb_teams>) element_grob(<element_cbb_headshots>) element_grob(<element_cbb_conferences>)
Theme elements for ggplot2 to Visualize College Basketball Elements

Scales

Functions for using color and fill scales

scale_color_cbb_teams() scale_colour_cbb_teams() scale_fill_cbb_teams() scale_color_cbb_conferences() scale_colour_cbb_conferences() scale_fill_cbb_conferences()
Color and Fill Scales for College Basketball Teams and Conferences

gt Utility Functions

Functions for use with gt Tables

gt_cbb_teams()
Render in Logo-Team HTML for Tables
gt_cbb_conferences()
Render in Conference Wordmarks in gt Tables
gt_color_results()
Color Rows in gt Table Based on Win/Loss Results
gt_set_font()
Set Font Family for All Parts of a gt Table
gt_bold_rows()
Bold rows in a GT table with optional filtering and highlighting
gt_theme_athletic()
The Athletic gt Table Theme
gt_theme_pl()
Premier League gt Table Theme
gt_theme_savant()
Baseball Savant gt Table Theme

Other Functions

Miscellaneous functions

get_espn_players()
Get ESPN Player IDs for a team
ggpreview()
Preview ggplot in Specified Dimensions
ggplot_cbb_logo_title()
Add a team logo in-line with plot title with ggplot2
gt_cbb_logo_title()
Add a Team Logo and Title/Subtitle to a gt Table.
cbbplotR_clear_cache()
Clear cbbplotR Cache
